name: ImprovTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Every weekday, get a new tip in your flash briefing from an experienced improviser, teacher, and theater owner. Whether you're an experienced improviser or you're new to the art, these tips are helpful reminders of how to be the best improviser you can be.

Break a leg!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
